attributes.action: Stop the "Absent Parent" having to pay CSA if there is no contact with there children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Under the current law the "absent Parent" has to pay csa until the child reaches the age of 19, i think the law should be changed so that if contact stops because the child no longer wants to see the "absent parent" then csa payments for that child should also stop, also if there is no contact for a period of time than csa payments should be halted until such time contact resumes.
